website_summaries.verdict: This set of 4 mugs is the best choice for your Irish coffee cup needs. They’re durable, dishwasher safe, and perfect for repeated use.
pros: Sturdy design and crafted out of high-quality, durable glass
We love how these are dishwasher safe and possess a handle that remains cool to the touch
They’re a good value, too, costing less than $5 each
cons: These mugs have a hollow spot on bottom of each where water frequently collects in the dishwasher

customer_reviews.title: So far each set has had a cracked or chipped mug....Wish me luck
customer_reviews.text: I think I'm going to like these mugs a lot, if I ever get a set that I can keep. First set had a chipped mug. Returned that set and ordered a replacement set. Second set had a mug with a crack clear through the handle. Returning that set and ordering another replacement set. Wish me luck! (I did chat with Amazon customer support to see if I could return just the cracked mug instead of all 4. Unfortunately, no.)
customer_reviews.author: Gentle Reader Jill

customer_reviews.title: Be careful of these
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I wanted clear glass and they are pretty. I should have done some research before purchasing them. They will not even hold a cup of coffee for me because I require creamer in my coffee. It floods over the top. Also, when I reheat my coffee in the microwave it is almost to hot to touch to remove it, but mysteriously my coffee is cold in under 5 minutes. I don't recommend these unless you don't care if your coffee gets cold fast!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Lareau

customer_reviews.title: Very nice thick glass!👌
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They are very thick and insulate well for glass. Makes enjoying a latte that much more special!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Been using these for 3 years, time to review them
customer_reviews.text: I just bought my third set of these since 2016, they are fantastic! They are microwave and dishwasher safe, and the base allows me to store them in my under-cabinet stemware rack, which I find super convenient! I generally use them for making lattes or sometimes plain coffee, but I like them so much that I find myself using them for other liquids as well. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Just 1/4 cracked upon opening package
customer_reviews.text: I love these glass mugs! They are perfect for cappuccino and lattes. Only complaint was that when I opened it, one had a strange crack in it already....the other 3 are fine but just the first one I pulled out of the box had a crack in it. Would be nice if company replaced for me but the other 3 work great.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Great for Coffee or Tea and they easily come clean!
customer_reviews.text: Love the design and simple beauty of these glasses. They come out of the dishwasher sparkling clean (although they do hold water in bottom part.) I use them mainly for my coffee and if I had a complaint it would be that they really don’t hold enough liquid. I wish they were 12 oz and maybe they’d hold 11? Have to use a smaller size on Keurig or they’ll run over.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Spradlin

customer_reviews.title: Looks great from front, not so much from the side
customer_reviews.text: One came with the base completely broken off. This isn’t my main issue, tho. I liked the look of these online, but there’s a very prominent seam running down the middle. If you care about that, you may want to go for another brand.
customer_reviews.author: X

customer_reviews.title: I would buy them again
customer_reviews.text: My mom dropped one from her hand as she was sitting down and it broke. But I still gave it 5 stars as glass is suppose to break when it hits a tile floor even though it was like 2 feet off the ground. No matter what, this product is solid and looks very good and pictures may not due it justice. Buy it, you won't regret it!!
customer_reviews.author: God first always!!

customer_reviews.title: All around nice mugs
customer_reviews.text: Love these mugs. They compliment anything I use them with. They have a nice size handle (I have trouble because of neuropathy with small handles). They look great and they hold the perfect amount. Only thing I don't like, which is no fault of the mugs, is they don't fit under the Keurig.
customer_reviews.author: Gramma Sue

customer_reviews.title: Visible seam
customer_reviews.text: The glasses had a very visible seam. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: jim b

customer_reviews.title: Received one of the cups with an internal bubble on the top of the glass
customer_reviews.text: Received one of the cups with a bubble on the lip of the cup. I wanted to return it back but my wife had already used one of the cups. The bubble eventually chipped within a week's time. I believe the supplier knew this fact as it couldn't have passed Quality control during manufacturing
customer_reviews.author: Trisha Chitkara

customer_reviews.title: Libby 10.5 ounce Irish Coffee Mugs
customer_reviews.text: I like this product and it measures up to my expectations. Sturdy glass. My purchase was for coffee ( no alcohol )and I recommend them highly.
customer_reviews.author: Dolores C. Craven

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed unsatisfied
customer_reviews.text: You get three cups one had a crack , one the bottom was chattered and one was complete glass , my bf has the box sitting near the table came in to open I cut my foot before I even open the box don’t know where the glass was coming from until I opened the box , I req new cups , threw the broken glass away so me are no ones else will get cut and I haven’t received any replacements yet or here anything from the seller
customer_reviews.author: Jah Goddess

customer_reviews.title: Chipped glass
customer_reviews.text: The mugs are beautiful, but I’m so upset as one of them is chipped on the rim, bought these for a gift and don’t have time to return and get new!!! Before the Anniversary party on Saturday, just disappointed
customer_reviews.author: mckenzie

customer_reviews.title: Love these glass coffee mugs
customer_reviews.text: We have a Nespresso coffee maker so being able to see the foam coffee through these glass mugs just makes the experience of drinking coffee that much better!

customer_reviews.title: 2 broken before using it
customer_reviews.text: They look very nice but two of them were broken when I got them

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The glass is thick and would probably survive a few falls. I use them for cappuccinos and they work great.

customer_reviews.title: Love the Quality of Libby Glass
customer_reviews.text: As always I am impressed with the quality of Libby glass. These are beautiful glasses. I can’t wait to use them!

customer_reviews.title: I'm gonna have my Irish Coffee at home.
customer_reviews.text: I am grading on appearances as I has yet to use them. All of processes required to get here was done very well.

customer_reviews.title: Resistent!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and super tough! There will always be someone to say it's easy to break! But don't believe it. This is talk of those who want to use glass as if it were plastic.

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: One was broken in the box when I received it. Other than that they are very nice. Didn’t want to go through trying to send it back but there was no way to order just one.

customer_reviews.text: These are nice for the price. Don't mind the "seams" in the glass. Refer back to the price...

customer_reviews.text: Makes everyday coffee special and special coffee or coco wonderful in presentation

customer_reviews.text: I love these Mugs. Good for hot or cold drinks. Good looking glass mugs.

customer_reviews.text: I like it, just what I was looking for! Perfect for hot wine or hot cocoa!

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses for value
customer_reviews.text: Have absolutely loved these glasses for Irish coffees (or regular coffees). Even though they aren't double-walled, the glass is so thick that the insulation is great -- never burning our hands again! Especially great that they are dishwasher-safe; we've washed these many, many times and they are still in great condition.

customer_reviews.title: Broken glasses

customer_reviews.title: These glasses were nice enough. They have a rather large hollow spot ...
customer_reviews.text: These glasses were nice enough. They have a rather large hollow spot on the bottom that will collect water in the dishwasher. It's a first world problem, but I can't live like that.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa H

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Looking Lattes ☕️
customer_reviews.text: Unlike some people, I was lucky enough to get all 4 of my cups in hand in one piece and not broken. But out of all the clear glass coffee cups that I saw on Amazon, these were the best looking ones and cheaper than the rest. It is insulated so don’t let the cool touch of the glass fool you. The coffee is still hot. I gave it a 4 star only because they placed the glass connection line in an odd place. It’s in one of my pictures I posted. So far, I’m impressed and glad I chose these instead of the more expensive and not so good looking ones.
customer_reviews.author: 🌟 FilipinaBarbie 🌟

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: These things have a solid, thick, clear glass construction. As for the Irish Coffee: it works. Just use one once instead of the recommended 1.33 oz of Irish Whiskey. One thing to realize: these things each have a slightly noticeable vertical seam opposite the handle. Not a big deal, just something else to know that the description does not mention.
customer_reviews.author: Batman

customer_reviews.title: Great design, solid material, not so bright glass
customer_reviews.text: A great glass, relatively heavy weight and easy to hold when full of hot liquid. The only thing that could be improved is the glass quality is not the best. The glass part could be clearer and brighter. The engineering of the glass is well done. It doesn’t chip easily. I purchased 3 sets and would recommend it to people who would like an every day glass for hot tea and coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Neda R.

customer_reviews.title: Feels like drinking restaurant coffee right at at home
customer_reviews.text: We go to breakfast at a place that serves cappuccino in mugs exactly like this. We have a coffee machine that makes cappuccino so now we can experience the indulgence of “restaurant” coffee in these great mugs! They are very sturdy and have a bit of heft to them, which I love. We’ve also used them for ice cream sundaes. A great purchase for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: ilovebooks

customer_reviews.title: As expected, nice glass mugs
customer_reviews.text: Nice thick glass mugs. As expected. Arrived unbroken. No problems. Now the trick is not dropping one. Price was high for 4 but othe only other lot was a 12 pack. There is a vertical seam where the 2 glass halves are molded together but no complaints from me so far.
customer_reviews.author: Devastator

customer_reviews.title: Great size and quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to accompany a Nespresso machine I gave my wife for Christmas. These glasses are really nice, they don’t feel cheap, won’t burn your hand, and they’re a great size for a variety of coffee/dessert drinks.
customer_reviews.author: PS03

customer_reviews.title: Can't really go wrong with Libbey products. They're cheap ...
customer_reviews.text: Can't really go wrong with Libbey products. They're cheap, durable, heavy, dishwasher safe, and stylish. We use these for anything from Irish (or bourbon) coffee, to mules.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, heavy to hold.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, heavy to hold. Glass is very thick for the size of glass, and the mold seam is much more prominent than I would have liked. But, the price was fair for a product of medium quality.

customer_reviews.text: These are great for tea and coffee and my husband loves them for his craft beers. The glass is thick, the handle doesn't heat up when presented with boiling water, and it survived a fall. They're not very big in terms of capacity, but they do the job.

product_meta.title: Libbey 10.5-ounce Irish Coffee Mug, 4-piece Set
product_meta.description: Offer your patrons an attractive, modern alternative to traditional china mugs by serving up your signature morning pick-me-ups in this Libbey 5304 10.5 oz. glass irish coffee mug made in USA. Your guests will love the full view of their cappuccinos, lattes, and hot chocolates provided by the crystal clear clarity of this glass mug. Its durable construction is instantly evident thanks to its thick glass walls and short, stable base. It also features a sturdy yet comfortable handle that is placed toward the top of the mug, ensuring a smooth sip every time.Dishwasher microwave safe.. Height: 5" Top Diameter: 3-1/16" Bottom Diameter: 2-3/4" Maximum Diameter: 4-1/4". Packed in a brown box special for shipping protection . For almost 200 years, Libbey has been a leading distributor of glassware, providing a wide selection of durable and elegant products to suit your many needs. In that grand tradition, the high-quality form and feel of this Irish coffee mug make it a perfect addition to any coffee shop or hotel breakfast buffet. Offering unparalleled brilliance and clarity, this glass makes it instantly clear that your customers are receiving the best product and service possible. For your convenience, it's also dishwasher safe to allow for easy cleanup after every use
feature_bullets: Made in USA 1st quality glass by LIBBEY

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars403 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
